how_to_use_this_file ->: Values may be changed in this file to modify load-path, save-path, and filename without a GUI. run_app_headless should be set to true, because the GUI is not ready. Choose only 0ne of the assets to change to true. You can change asset path values to a different location if you wish to analyze a zip saved in a custom location. So, if you wish to analyze an older release of the Assets.zip file, you can modify the pregenerated path. All paths must use forward-slashes: ( / ). All paths must end with a forward-slash. Filenames can be whatever you like.
